DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study : - ass Optivate速 consumption ( IU/kg consume per month prophylactic on-demand therapy dose bleed ) . - assess clinical outcome treat bleed Optivate速 . - evaluate Optivate速 term clinical tolerance safety child age 6 year . . - ass FVIII inhibitor development study .
